Tip

Check your keybinds in Settings - FiveM. Most of our sripts allow you set your own key binds. You can also remove some of the keybinds that you dont use.

docs.title: Features
docs.text: • To be added

docs.title: How to use Vmenu.
docs.text:
We currently use Vmenu for creating players, spawning vehicles, and getting weapons in the server

To open Vmenu press F1 on your keyboard.

You will have the following options for normal users.

Name Description Online Players Check to see who is online, TP to other players. Player Related Options Heal yourself, change your ped, create MP peds, add or remove weapons Vehicle Related options Spawn Vehicles, edit vehicles Voice Chat Settings Manage your voice settings Recording Options make clips while in game to edit later Misc Settings Vmenu Settings, wear you can save your settings, clear locals from a scene, etc.

docs.title: How to create a player in Vmenu
docs.text:
In order to create a player in Vmenu, you will select mp ped customization in player related options.

Then you will click on either Create Male Character, or Create Female Character.

After selecting the gender of you ped you will then be given the options, to choose appearance, tattoos, clothes, and props.

After creating your character, make sure you save it, it will close after. Make sure you give it a name you will remember.

Tip

You can only have one character with the same name, if you have more then one of the same ped, with different clothes you will need to add to the name for it to save.

docs.title: How to edit a player in Vmenu
docs.text:
In order to edit a player in Vmenu, you will select mp ped customization in player related options.

Then you will need to click on Saved Peds

Then select the saved ped to edit.

docs.title: Spawning weapons in Vmenu
docs.text:
In order to get weapons in Vmenu, you will select weapon options in player related options.

afterwards you may click on spawn by name, or go thought each category and spawn the weapons you would like.

docs.title: Saving as a loadout.
docs.text:
to save you weapons in a loadout you will need to click on weapon loadouts in player related options

then you will select save loadout to save the loadout you have. Edit the load out, to edit your saved loadouts

docs.title: Spawning vehicles in Vmenu
docs.text: In order to spawn vehicles in Vmenu, you will need to select vehicle options.

docs.title: Vehicle Options
docs.text: Select vehicle options to edit your paint, liverys, vehicle mods, etc

docs.title: Vehicle Spawner
docs.text: Spawn vehicles by name, categories, etc

docs.title: Saved Vehicles
docs.text: Save vehicles to use for later, spawn saved vehicles.

docs.title: Personal Vehicle
docs.text: Set your personal vehicle, where you can lock the doors, turn the engine on while near the vehicle, etc
